\Aura\Filter

\Aura\FilterRuleCollection

A collection of rules to be applied to a data object.

todo

Constants

HARD_RULE

HARD_RULE

Stop filtering on a field when a rule fails.

Tags

todo

SOFT_RULE

SOFT_RULE

Continue filtering on a field when a rule fails.

Tags

todo

STOP_RULE

STOP_RULE

Stop filtering on all fields when a rule fails.

Tags

todo

IS

IS

Apply a rule to check if the value is valid.

Tags

todo

IS_NOT

IS_NOT

Apply a rule to check if the value **is not** valid.

Tags

todo

IS_BLANK_OR

IS_BLANK_OR

Apply a rule to check if the value is blank **or** is valid.

Tags

todo

FIX

FIX

Sanitize the value according to the rule.

Tags

todo

FIX_BLANK_OR

FIX_BLANK_OR

Sanitize the value to `null` if blank, or according to the rule if not.

Tags

todo

addHardRule(string $field, string $method, string $name) : $this

string $method
string $name

Returns

$this

addStopRule()

addStopRule(string $field, string $method, string $name) : $this

useFieldMessage()

useFieldMessage(string $field, string $message) : void

Use a custom message for a field when it fails any of its rules; this single message will replace all the various rule messages.

Parameters

string $field

The field name.
string $message

The message to use when the field fails any of its rules.

Tags

todo

values()

values(object|array $data) : bool

Applies the rules to the field values of a data object or array; note that sanitizing filters may modify the values in place.

Parameters

object|array $data

The data object or array to be filtered; note that this is passed by reference.

Throws

\InvalidArgumentException

Returns

bool —

True if all rules were applied without error; false if there was at least one error.

Tags

todo

getMessages()

getMessages(string $field) : array

Returns the array of failure messages.

Parameters

string $field

Return messages just for this field; if empty, return messages for all fields.

Returns

array

Tags

todo

addMessages()

addMessages(string $field, string|array $messages) : void

Manually add messages to a particular field.

Parameters

string $field

Add to this field.
string|array $messages

Add these messages to the field.

Tags

todo

value()

value(mixed $value, string $method, string $name) : bool

Convenience method to apply a rule directly to an individual value.

Parameters

mixed $value

Apply the rule to this value; note that this is passed by reference, so the rule may modify the value in place.
string $method

The rule method to use; e.g., Filter::IS.
string $name

The of the rule to apply.

Returns

bool —

True if the rule was applied successfully, false if not.

Tags

todo

addRule()

addRule(string $field, string $method, string $name, string $params, string $type)

Add a rule.

Parameters

string $field

The field name.
string $method

The rule method to use (is, isNot, isBlankOr, etc).
string $name

The name of the rule to apply.
string $params

Params for the rule.
string $type

The rule type: soft, hard, stop.

Tags

todo

addMessageFromRule()

addMessageFromRule(string $field, \Aura\Filter\RuleInterface $rule) : void

Adds a failure message for a field.

Parameters

string $field

The field that failed.
\Aura\Filter\RuleInterface $rule

The rule that the field failed to pass.
